segments.text: I'm sorry , Sam . I don't want to go to the folk concert .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about going to the theatre ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't like going to the theatre .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , what do you like doing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Travelling , swimming , going to the cinema . And you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like painting , sailing , watching football and talking to you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like talking to you , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you want to go to an exhibition ? There is one at the Xinghai Exhibition Hall tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2
